faq.rules: Please make sure to check (Ripple's rules)[http://ripple.moe/?p=23].
faq.blog: You can find the latest Ripple news on the (blog)[https://ripple.moe/blog/]!
faq.english: Please keep this channel in english.
faq.topic: Can you please drop the topic and talk about something else?
faq.lines: Please try to keep your sentences on a single line to avoid getting silenced.
